originalTitle: Kenyans drop flowers for Valentine's bouquets of cash. Not everyone is impressed
title: Kenyans drop flowers for Valentine's bouquets of cash. Not everyone is impressed
content: Bouquets of cash have been blooming in popularity in Kenya but recent warnings may slow the trend.

originalTitle: Sudanese city had 6,000 killed in three days, UN says
title: Sudanese city had 6,000 killed in three days, UN says
content: Paramilitary Rapid Support Forces (RSF) committed the atrocities in el-Fasher, says a UN report.

originalTitle: A seat at the table or on the menu? Africa grapples with the new world order
title: A seat at the table or on the menu? Africa grapples with the new world order
content: The US president has shaken up international relations and the continent is working out where it stands.

originalTitle: Deadly drone strikes cloud US-brokered Russia-Ukraine talks in Geneva
title: Deadly drone strikes cloud US-brokered Russia-Ukraine talks in Geneva
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy and US Secretary of State Marco Rubio hint at difficulties in next week's talks.

originalTitle: Bangladeshi PM-in-waiting urges opposition to work with BNP
title: Bangladeshi PM-in-waiting urges opposition to work with BNP
content: Bangladeshi Prime Minister-in-waiting Tarique Rahman urged opposition parties to work with the incoming BNP government.

originalTitle: England beat Scotland to get T20 World Cup bid back on track
title: England beat Scotland to get T20 World Cup bid back on track
content: England beat Scotland by five wickets in India to recover position in group at 2026 T20 World Cup.

originalTitle: Gisèle Pelicot tells BBC: I felt crushed by horror - but I don't feel anger
title: Gisèle Pelicot tells BBC: I felt crushed by horror - but I don't feel anger
content: In an extensive interview with Newsnight, the woman at the heart of France's biggest rape trial speaks about betrayal, healing and choosing the right path.

originalTitle: Police activity under way near Nancy Guthrie's home
title: Police activity under way near Nancy Guthrie's home
content: A search has been carried out in Tuscon, Arizona, close to where the 84-year-old was abducted nearly two weeks ago.

originalTitle: Can Bangladesh's new leader bring change after election landslide?
title: Can Bangladesh's new leader bring change after election landslide?
content: Tarique Rahman is set to be Bangladesh's next prime minister, 18 months after mass protests ousted its longest-serving leader.

originalTitle: Neto scores hat-trick as Chelsea see off Hull in FA Cup
title: Neto scores hat-trick as Chelsea see off Hull in FA Cup
content: A Pedro Neto hat-trick fires Chelsea through to the FA Cup fifth round with a comfortable win at Championship Hull City.

originalTitle: Wrexham beat Ipswich to progress to FA Cup fifth round
title: Wrexham beat Ipswich to progress to FA Cup fifth round
content: Wrexham book their place in the fifth round of the FA Cup for the first time in 29 years as they beat Championship rivals Ipswich Town at Stok Cae Ras.

title: Final Score
content: Jason Mohammad and guests bring you all the goals, analysis, reaction and interviews.
